reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not all ninjas are evil, y\'know
reviews.comment: Ninja Guard puts you in charge of defending a gate against onrushing hordes of enemy ninjas. As you stand atop the gate, you eliminate ninjas by swiping them, which fires throwing stars at them. Pretty soon, you\'re swiping all over the place, which would be fine on its own, except that each star thrown takes away a bit of your total energy. Once you\'re out of energy, you can\'t attack again until it recharges, which it only does slowly. So all the gold you collect from each vanquished foe you\'ll want to spend wisely: Will you purchase stronger weapons to eliminate enemies quicker, or buy energy potions to be able to fight longer? It\'s up to you, ninja-san; download Ninja Guard today! -- via Best Apps Market
